name: La Dehesa, Acampada y Autocaravanas
title: (37510) La Dehesa, Acampada y Autocaravanas
description: The La Dehesa campsite is located within the "Rebollar" region and surrounded by the Sierra de Gata, surrounded by a beautiful landscape from where you can enjoy peaks and rivers, oak and chestnut forests. It is located in the municipal recreational area, just 500 meters from the town, it has tables, a barbecue area and a beach bar. The entire area is fenced and has great shade from ancient oak trees. The campsite has toilets and showers, pitches with power outlets, water sources with outlets. In summer there is also a swimming pool with free access even if you are not staying at the campsite, a wonderful pool with a great atmosphere and pleasant shaded grassy areas.

There is a picnic area with banks and four tables and without any kind of services. It can be difficult to stay overnight in the vicinity of more than 1,300 meters above sea level. description: ATTENTION! Blackboard, the track is 6-7 km, it is worth visiting, remember it is a track, some bump has but in general it is very good, I do not post photos, you have to see it !! You can dare to enter with a van type van big, but until the end of the track you will not be able to turn around, if you are not afraid and progress you will flip

More than a village parties... If you are in the area do not miss them..., less in July and august the rest of the year you are practically alone, bathrooms in the chiringuito, there are no showers... You eat well in the restaurants of the area. Just spend the night, you may pass g. Civil, respect!

title_short: (10620) Caminomorisco - 5 Calle Factoría de los Ángeles

Large parking lot with trees for shade. Across from Guardia Civil post, where I asked about overnight parking. They said it’s fine for two or three nights. Paved surface. 

There are two schools nearby so it might be noisy at times during the school year.

title: (10623) Vegas de Coria -

title: (10624) Las Mestas -

title: (10630) Pinofranqueado - EX-204

title: (10629) Caminomorisco - 14 EX-204
description: Picnic, place to stop, to eat or overnight, next to the road, flat area, with tables, no water, no toilet, possibility to take a walk or make bicycle routes, following the road, beautiful views of the town and the Teso neighborhood that was the old town and is now abandoned, place of myths and legends, in the village there is a bar on the same road.

name: Camping - Bungalows Del Pino
title: (10630) Camping - Bungalows Del Pino
description: 1st category campsite located in Las Hurdes, Cáceres, Spain. It  has 6 lodges made by wood and 45 pitches for tents, caravans, motorhomes, etc. It provides middle-range service. It offers facilities and services such as restaurant, bar, laundry service, gambling services and front desk.

title: (10630) Pinofranqueado - 16 Calle los Llanos
description: Gravel parking lot just at the end of the natural pool. Safe site. Entrance from Calle los llanos and on the side of the treatment plant. poplar grove with lots of shade and in the middle of nature is the end of the pine tree river walk.

title: (37624) La Alberca - 9 SA-201
description: Plain place where you can park, spend the night,, with the river nearby, clean and transparent water, you can drink it, come directly from the mountains, surrounded by nature, on the side of the road, but without noise at night as it is not enough busy, by day there is more movement, passing people, or the natural park to make routes, at night you stay alone, is near the mestas or the pool tourist sites in summer season, the rest of the year there is a lot of tranquility! !

name: Área de Autocaravanas La Alberca
title: (37624) Área de Autocaravanas La Alberca
description: This is a great Aire fairly flat and spacious. Free with grey and black waste disposal. Fresh water is also available. You will need a compressible fitting to attach a hose to the tap. The town it’s self is wonderful lots to see and do.

title: (37600) Tamames - Avenida Tejeda
description: Public parking of the municipal swimming pools (only open in summer). Very nice led lighting, shaded, good access from the all paved road. A 5-minute walk (or 1 by car) from the municipality along a pleasant paved and illuminated walk. Next to the pelota court, soccer field, paddle tennis court and the local picnic area. It is located next to the mountain where you can make very beautiful hiking trails. Without services, it has containers. The town has all the services, a large supermarket, health center, workshops, gas station, financial entities, bars and restaurants... Many large shady trees and the possibility of parking between them. Without regulations of not staying overnight, a friendly municipality with all possible services. Day and night it is a very very quiet place.

title: (37624) La Alberca - SN Avenida Batuecas
description: Free municipal parking, quiet to spend the night (especially on the top of the car park) .. close to the city. no service

title: (37624) La Alberca - 9 SA-201
description: Perfect viewpoint to rest and spend the night, very quiet with magnificent views, very little coverage, ideal for disconnecting

title: (37624) La Alberca - SA-201
description: Parking of the Mirador del Portillo. Fairly level and good views. To put a snag, if there is a lot of wind, you can hear a lot up there.

title: (10624) Las Mestas - 1 Calle Sol
description: Good place to park, and visit the town, it is also very tilted, there is a great store for honey products, Uncle Picho.

title: (37659) San Martín del Castañar -

title: (37542) Navasfrías - 31 CV-148
description: El Bardal is a recreational area with oak trees (one of the largest in Spain) and lots of shade, with stone tables and a beach bar. It is prohibited to enter the premises with vehicles but you can spend the night without problem in the surrounding area, also in the shade. There is a municipal swimming pool and a hostel. Easy access for motorhomes. Services open only on weekends in winter and in summer every day, now closed. Drinking water source. Children's park. 2 minutes from the town that is worth visiting, with restaurants, hostels and supermarkets.

title: (10860) Gata - 4 Calle Gabriel y Galán
description: Very spacious and flat parking. Very close to the center. There are paddle tennis, futsal and basketball courts.

title: (10860) Gata - Avenida Virgen del Puerto
description: Indescribable monument to the peace of clear and limpid horizons. Magical place to look at these beautiful cat mountains. There are stone tables, a clear water fountain, huge and idyllic pine trees, barbecues and a 360-degree landscape of vastness. The town of GATA 10 minutes walk ... a beautiful place !!!

title: (37624) La Alberca -

title: (37659) San Martín del Castañar - 4A Calle Larga
title_short: (37659) San Martín del Castañar - 4A Calle Larga

It is well conditioned to be without time limitation. It is very quiet. To get to the place you must cross the town by one of the two accessible streets, only for camper vans. Refrain motorhomes and trailers for the narrow streets.

title: (10865) Cadalso - CC-5.1

title: (6440) Vilar Torpim - Unnamed Road

title_short: (10649) Casar de Palomero - 25 Carretera Rivera Oveja
description: Quiet place next to the olive tree museum of Villa de Casar de Palomero. fully accessible even for 7.5m caravans. The Villa de Casar de Palomero is probably the most interesting of Las Hurdes and deserves a visit and a walk through its streets. The river is also spectacular.

title: (10868) Hernán-Pérez - Unnamed Road

title: (6320) Soito - Unnamed Road

title: (10868) Hernán-Pérez - Unammed Road

Great point to take the evening sun. Parking on grass but firm underfoot. Rural motorhoming at its best. one negative point is the tap does not have a screw connection which makes filling up difficult.

title: (10649) Casar de Palomero - 24 Lugar Castañar

title_short: (10864) Torre de Don Miguel - CC-6.3 piscina natural de Torre de Don Miguel

The pool has a large lawn area, parasols, a nice beach bar with good prices and old oil mills restored as an "archaeological park". The population of Torre de Don Miguel, about 1.5 km, is very beautiful.

address.street: CC-6.3 piscina natural de Torre de Don Miguel

Natural pools with parking by the river with plenty of shade. Busy place in summer. Parking is allowed.
Animals are prohibited in the pools. There is a restaurant by the river.
Next to the road, the little traffic could bother.

name: Camping Riomalo
title: (10624) Camping Riomalo
description: Camping next to the natural pool. Cozy place, each plot has its own sink with drinking water, own bar and another one outside. price good. For small campers yes. Otherwise mostly permanent campers. People very nice. very narrow. below nice meadow for camping.

title: (10624) Riomalo de Abajo - 13A Calle Escuelas
description: Parking trees of the village on the banks of the river in the street that goes to the campsite. Very quiet place, shadows, and good start to the meander route. We were at the end of October so quiet. We slept 3 vans and the next day we left there 1 caravan. 2 bars at 50 meters.

title: (10624) Riomalo de Abajo - 1 Diseminado Riomalo
description: Small grass esplanade to visit the meander.

title: (10624) Riomalo de Abajo - 13A Calle Escuelas

title: (10859) Santibáñez el Alto - CC-56
description: Area with 3 picnic areas and barbecue, little parking capacity

title: (6320-624) Soito - 57 Avenida São Cristovão

title: (10857) Acebo - CCV-32.3
description: Nice place, surrounded by several natural swimming pools, with large green areas, bar and public services. Departure of hiking trails.

title: (10857) Acebo - CC-32.3

title: (10857) Acebo - CC-32.3
description: Parking Next to the road but very quiet to sleep. Next to splendid natural pool beautiful setting. Possibility of eating in a restaurant. With services.
